h1_title: How to Unlock the Secret Ending (True Ending)
h2_title: Unlock and Complete Kingdom of Sahali (Chapter 2)
content: To find the secret area in Chapter 2, you'll need to complete the drunken boar's questline. Once inside the Kingdom of Sahali, you'll have two bosses to fight to finish up this secret section.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Secret_Ending_(True_Ending).md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Secret Ending (True Ending)', specifically from the subsection 'Unlock and Complete Kingdom of Sahali (Chapter 2)'.
The content is as follows:
To find the secret area in Chapter 2, you'll need to complete the drunken boar's questline. Once inside the Kingdom of Sahali, you'll have two bosses to fight to finish up this secret section.
